title: The Fifth Queen Crowned
description: Excerpt: ... the cornet answered. Having got out the packet of the Queen's letter, he girded up his belt again. 505 'You will get you ready to ride with me, ' he said to Mary Hall. 'For I will not be in these marshes after nightfall, but will sleep at Shrimpton Inn.' He looked around him and adde
author: Ford Madox Ford
